title: Jeffrey Katzenberg backs the $10M Seed round for HUBUC’s embedded finance API - TechCrunch
content: Jeffrey Katzenberg backs the $10M Seed round for HUBUC’s embedded finance API  TechCrunch
description: I recently wrote about the so-called “Embedded finance” trend, citing the example of Intergiro’s recent fund-raising in the space. There’s now yet another example of this trend in the shape of HUBUC. Billing itself as “AWS for financial services” the startup — which emerged from Barcelona, Cataloni…
